sentences.en: She was proud of her long pedigree.
sentences.cn: 她为自己源远流长的家世而自豪。

sentences.en: The product has a pedigree going back to the last century.
sentences.cn: 这项产品的渊源可追溯到上个世纪。

sentences.en: Hammer's business pedigree almost guaranteed him the acquaintance of presidents.
sentences.cn: 哈默的商业背景几乎保证了他与几位总统的相识。
